verses.verse: (A Psalm of David, when he was in the wilderness of Judah.) O <S%H430>God,<s%> Thou art my <S%H410>God;<s%> I shall <S%H7836>seek<s%> Thee <S%H7836>earnestly;<s%> My <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H6770>thirsts<s%> for Thee, my <S%H1320>flesh<s%> <S%H3642>yearns<s%> for Thee, In a <S%H6723>dry<s%> and <S%H5889>weary<s%> <S%H776>land<s%> where there is <S%H1097>no<s%> <S%H4325>water.<s%>
<S%H3651>Thus<s%> I have <S%H2372>beheld<s%> Thee in the <S%H6944>sanctuary,<s%> To <S%H7200>see<s%> Thy <S%H5797>power<s%> and Thy <S%H9202>glory.<s%>
<S%H3651>So<s%> I will <S%H1288>bless<s%> Thee as long as I <S%H9132>live;<s%> I will <S%H5375>lift<s%> up my <S%H3709>hands<s%> in Thy <S%H8034>name.<s%>

My <S%H5315>soul<s%> is <S%H7646>satisfied<s%> as with <S%H2459>marrow<s%> and <S%H1880>fatness,<s%> And my <S%H6310>mouth<s%> <S%H1984>offers<s%> <S%H1984>praises<s%> with <S%H7445>joyful<s%> <S%H8193>lips.<s%>
<S%H518>When<s%> I <S%H2142>remember<s%> Thee on my <S%H3326>bed,<s%> I <S%H1897>meditate<s%> on Thee in the night <S%H821>watches,<s%>
For Thou hast <S%H1961>been<s%> my <S%H5833>help,<s%> And in the <S%H6738>shadow<s%> of Thy <S%H3671>wings<s%> I <S%H7442>sing<s%> for <S%H7442>joy.<s%>
But <S%H1992>those<s%> who <S%H1245>seek<s%> my <S%H5315>life,<s%> to <S%H9585>destroy<s%> it, Will <S%H935>go<s%> into the <S%H8482>depths<s%> of the <S%H776>earth.<s%>
They will be <S%H5064>delivered<s%> <S%H5064>over<s%> to the <S%H3027>power<s%> of the <S%H2719>sword;<s%> They will be a <S%H4521>prey<s%> for <S%H7776>foxes.<s%>

But the <S%H4428>king<s%> will <S%H8055>rejoice<s%> in <S%H430>God;<s%> <S%H3605>Everyone<s%> who <S%H7650>swears<s%> by Him will <S%H1984>glory,<s%> For the <S%H6310>mouths<s%> of those who <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H8267>lies<s%> will be <S%H5534>stopped.<s%>
